awards.text: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 1 win & 3 nominations.

fullplot: The other party is in disarray. Five men vie for the party nomination for president. No one has a majority as the first ballot closes and the front-runners begin to decide how badly they want the job.
plot: The two front runners for their party's Presidential nomination, one principled and the other ruthless, vie for the ex-President's endorsement.
title: The Best Man
